Exclusion Ground description socsec-pay Payment of social security contributions
Exclusion Ground description envir-law Breaching of obligations in the fields of environmental law

Exclusion Ground description insolvency Insolvency
Other Exclusion Ground description nati-ground Purely national exclusion grounds
